title: BoFA investor survey: Biggest tech underweight position since Aug 2006 - Reuters
content: BoFA investor survey: Biggest tech underweight position since Aug 2006  Reuters
description: Investors have ramped up their underweight tech position to its largest in more than 15 years as central bank tightening remained the top risk to global markets in 2022, according to a monthly fund manager survey by BoFA Securities.
